author: JUAN A. LOZANO Associated Press
title: Police shoot man after woman stabbed outside Houston store
description: Houston police say an officer shot and killed a man who had fatally stabbed a woman in a store parking lot and then threatened the officer with a knife
content:
HOUSTON -- 
A Houston police officer shot and killed a man who had fatally stabbed a woman in a store parking lot Saturday and was threatening the officer with a knife, police say.
It was the fifth fatal shooting by a Houston police officer within the last … [+1387 chars]

author: The Associated Press
title: Fred Willard, the comedic improv-style actor, has died at 86
description: Fred Willard, the comedic actor whose improv style kept him relevant for more than 50 years in films like “This Is Spinal Tap,” “Best In Show” and “Anchorman,” has died
content:
LOS ANGELES -- 
Fred Willard, the comedic actor whose improv style kept him relevant for more than 50 years in films like This Is Spinal Tap, Best In Show and Anchorman, has died. He was 86.
